name: mmpuzzle
description:
"mmPuzzle" is a short session Puzzle game.

The player always has five images. When you collect three of them, the next five will be available. The collection is growing.

The game has no age restrictions, and the difficulty level is 16 elements for each image. The gameplay is simplified by the presence of the final image, and the right elements always fit together.

Controls:
1. select any element of the image
2. select a free space where we want to place the element
3. if you need to remove an element - double-click on it

300+ pictures (5..7 hours)
